title: Dining Services | University of Illinois at Chicago

Dining Services     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Dining Services      Dining Services   Main Menu    Locations           Student Center East    Student Center West    Behavioral Sciences Building    Clinical Sciences North    Academic and Residential Complex    James Stukel Towers    Library of Health Sciences    On the Mall    Outpatient Care Clinic    School of Public Health & Psychiatric Institute    Student Recreation Facility    Student Services Building    UIC Daley Library    University Hall         Menus    Wellness           Balanced U    Choose My Plate    My Fitness Pal    Sustainability         Catering    Meal Plans           For Students    Flames Fare         About           FAQ    Events    Student Job Opportunities    Staff    Feedback          Eyebrow menu    Student Centers    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                              Dining Services       Dining Services  Serving the UIC community             UIC Dining Services is committed to serving students and the rest of the UIC community every day.  We serve nutritious food for every taste and style.  We are committed to sustainability and work hard to find locally sourced suppliers and we have well established and active compositing program.  Customer service is at the heart of everything we strive to do.  Eating together is about building community; join us in one of our dining halls or retails food operations across the UIC campus.         Updated Dining Hours until 4/30/2020         Call to Action            Events            Hours & Locations                    Catering            FAQs             Feedback           Main Links           Menus and Nutrition             Meal Plans                 Love To Dine On Campus?  Check dining schedules. Enjoy new Features. Give us Feedback. Dine On Campus™ provides helpful, dining-related information for your school. After selecting your school, you can find places to eat, whether or not they’re open, and how close they are to you. Once you select a location, you can get directions using Maps and browse menu items. Tapping on a menu item displays the nutritional information and other important details. You can even add menu items to HealthKit if you’re interested in tracking the nutritional value of what you eat.   Get The App!
